price: Karena itu Allah memberikan kepada mereka pahala di dunia236 dan pahala yang baik di akhirat.  Dan Allah menyukai orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan.
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
footnotes: 236.  Pahala dunia dapat berupa kemenangan-kemenangan, memperoleh harta rampasan, pujian-pujian, dan lain-lain.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
